generations.content_context: Development is focused on platform stability, extensive documentation expansion for the REST API and CLI, and a UI cleanup to resolve a backlog of agent management issues. Strategic planning for January 2026 centers on defining the next generation of public agents, including forking, knowledge transfer, and discovery modules.

   - Platform Improvements (Stability, Documentation, UI)  
   - 2026 Strategic Roadmap (Next-Gen Public Agents, Forking, Knowledge Transfer, Discovery)
